name: Executive Order
description:
This is a silly little game I made as part of a little jam with my friend.

Make your way up the office building to deliver the CEO's lunch.

I wasn't sure if bigger or little text was easier to read - I found the little a lot easier to parse, but I've left both options available for those who find the smaller text difficult.

The game was generated from story dice that you can see below.  My friend @Jademalo also made a game using these prompts that you can find here: [link to come].
